function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited access to multiple bathrooms for majority of the population","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to shared sanitary facilities","Mitigation":"Implementation of alternative sanitation solutions, such as communal bathrooms with enhanced cleaning protocols","Technologies":"Sanitization and disinfection technologies for communal facilities","People":"Majority of the population in affordable housing","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, and policymakers"},{"Description":"High probability of exposure in communal spaces of hotels and multi-residential complexes","Impact":"Increased risk of infection transmission in communal areas","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation and air exchange systems, enhanced cleaning and disinfection protocols, and crowd management strategies","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration and purification systems, IoT sensors for monitoring occupancy and air quality","People":"Residents, hotel guests, and visitors","Owner":"Building management and facility operators"},{"Description":"Lack of containment and insulation of private sphere from communal sphere","Impact":"Difficulty in managing infection risk and preventing transmission between private and communal spaces","Mitigation":"Creation of containment spaces with sealed doors and rapid air exchange, implementation of airlock systems if necessary","Technologies":"Rapid air exchange systems, smart door access control, airlock technologies","People":"Occupants of private rooms and apartments","Owner":"Architects, building developers, and facility managers"}]}
